Michael,

  

I am so sorry that I have not replied to you in a day or so.  It is so nice to
chat with you on the e-mail.  I am so depressed since my auntie died and our
prayer meetings do not seem to help that much.  But just the thought of helping
you and your mother is such a wonderful blessing that the gods must be acting
through you to help me out of the horrible depression that I have been feeling.
 I pray and perform sacrificial rites in your name and pray for your poor
mother.  If the water quality is bad and diarrhea is a problem we can use our
contacts to send a shipment of bottled water and Pepto-Bismol to your mother's
camp.  My company is working on a project to build a parking garage near the
Lekki Market in Lago, Nigeria.  I am sure that we could get a good rate on
shipping to send the water to Ghana.  Our sponsor partner , the Faucet Water
company said that they would donate an entire 40 foot container in hopes of
expanding their customer base around the world.  Water is such a precious
commodity and their water is infused with herbs which bring on a euphoric
feeling to all who drink it.  Faucet Water just needs a point of contact at the
refugee camp.

meet with me or my company's representative in Lagos, I could give you the
banking information in person.  I am not sure that e-mail is safe in African
companies.  Which account would you like me to use.  My business account is
available and regularly hold millions of dollars that we use throughout the
world to finance major construction jobs.  It is not uncommon for that account
to transit millions of dollars a month.  There is also my personal account
which holds some what less money.  And of course my churches account could take

the church is a registered charity.  You still have not told me what kind of

The dates are not finalized yet but I should have a few days free.  How far is

am so excited about the parking structure.  It is in anticipation to building
the first Walmart store in Africa.  Walmart is a national chain store that
sells household goods, clothing and foods at reasonable prices.  It is very
popular in the United States.  If you are able to reach Lagos, I am sure that a
menial job would not be necessary as I am almost positive that I could get you
a job at the new Walmart.  

  

I was unsure as to your directions about Mr. PHILIP REIZEGER.  Who is he and
why is he in Ethiopia.  Could you please explain his role.  Will I have to pay
him a commission?  For now please feel comforted in the thought that you are in
our coven's prayers and that I think about you plight and you escape from
imminent death and persecution in your home country.  Please be careful and let
me know about the water.  There would be no charges to you and my company can
write off the expenses as a charitable donation.  Tax time is just around the
corner and we need to give some money away so that our tax bill is less that
last year.
 
 

 

Your truly,

 
 
Glenn

Michael,

  

I am doing OK.  Thanks for your kind words.  My aunts death has really got me
depressed.  Our coven met on Saturday night to hold prayer and to contact her
departed spirit.  We were successful in our deeds and she spoke to us from
beyond.  I know that it sounds strange that she would speak to us but it is
true.  I mean that there were no sounds in the air but I could hear her words
in my head.  I asked about what I should do to help you and your mother and my
aunt answered that I should do all that I can to help you in your time of need
and that good deeds bring their own reward.

  

This was especially good news after my meeting with our vice president of
finance, Melissa Hautebodi.  When I asked her to prepare a document with our
account information she hesitated and said that I was being scammed.  I became
a little irate and told her that you have behaved most honorably and that I was
only giving the information to assist in the transaction, I was not going to
